biotools.summary: A highly useful and flexible tool for calibration of targeted MS‐based measurements. CalibraCurve enables an automated batch-mode determination of dynamic linear ranges and quantification limits for both targeted proteomics and similar assays. The software uses a variety of measures to assess the accuracy of the calibration and provides intuitive visualizations.
